Name: Seasons
About the game: Seasons is a precision platform that the player must overcome the challenges of each season of the year and reach the end of the level. Simple and precise controls (jump, double-jump and dash) Stunning pixel art and fluid animations, with 4 backgrounds each based on a season Varied gameplay in more than 30 stages with different mechanics
